data.name: Henchman Story Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy 22 original tracks and over 1 hour of jazz and funk inspired music, including every background track used in Henchman Story and it's special ending theme - "Life Story," featuring the vocals of Elsie Lovelock.

Composed by Cliff Keller
Music Mastering by Erik Peabody

"Life Story"
Vocals by Elsie Lovelock
Mixing, Mastering and Guitars by Erik Peabody
Lyrics by Cliff Keller and Marc Soskin

data.short_description: The original soundtrack for Henchman Story. Features 22 original tracks and over 1 hour of jazz and funk inspired music.
